segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar, his stool wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on those cookies that he doesn’t realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, her hand outstretched like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she knows it’s wrong, but she’s not stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless she’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined if she doesn’t turn off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for whoever has to clean this up later.
segments.speaker: PAR
